publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2633.1 Dr Richard Simpson: Faslane and the Anti-Nuclear Campaign-As an amendment to motion (S1M-2633) in the name of Tommy Sheridan, leave out from "believes" to end and insert "supports the right of demonstrators to protest peacefully in support of world peace, but condemns those in a democratic society who abuse this right and act in contravention of the criminal law." Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*
